---
name: 功能需求 / Feature Request
about: 建議工具新增功能 / Suggest new features for the tool
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

### 功能描述 / Feature Description
請清晰描述你想要新增的功能（繁中優先，英文亦可）。
A clear and concise description of the feature you want (Traditional Chinese preferred, English is also acceptable).

### 使用場景 / Use Case
描述該功能的使用場景，以及能解決的問題。
Describe the use case for this feature and what problem it solves.

### 實作建議 / Implementation Suggestion
（選擇性）如果你有實作思路或參考範例，歡迎提出。
(Optional) If you have ideas for implementation or reference examples, feel free to share.

### 參考資料 / Additional References
（選擇性）附上相關截圖、連結或文件作為參考。
(Optional) Add screenshots, links, or documents as references.
